alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Kennebec; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 11:23AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southwestern Kennebec... southern Oxford and central Androscoggin Counties... At 1121 AM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Livermore Falls to 11 miles west of Bethel...and moving southeast AT 25 MPH. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Auburn, Augusta, Gardiner, Bridgton, Fryeburg, Mechanic Falls, Bethel, Rumford, Turner, Jay, Litchfield, Livermore Falls, Farmingdale, Manchester, Dixfield, Hallowell, Canton, Andover, and Waterford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 50 and 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 99 and 111. This also includes... Speckled Mountain, Evans Notch, Caribou Mountain, East Royce Mountain, and Albany Mountain. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. * Sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Kennebec; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford
